title: Pappapappa Lyrics Papparappa Lyrics Vettai single songs lyrics
stanzas:
Pappappapan pappapaan Pappappa pappapaan
pathikichu pambaram doi
Pappappa pappapaan Pappappa pappapaan
Enna senja mandhiram doi

Adi raasaathi rosaapu enna solla
en raa thookkam thookikittu porapulla
Naan thillaanaa paaduren thimuraaga aaduren
ennoda kaikhokka vaadi..
Un pollaadha meesayil kuthaaama kuthunaa
sethaa naan poven poda ..

Ye Pappappappan pappapaan Pappappa pappapaan
pathikichu pambaram doi
Papparappa pappapaan Pappappa pappapaan
Enna senja mandhiram doi

Ye kodi idai paathu naan odanchiten nethu
Mutham kitham thandhu enna otta vaiyen di

Vallayadi vallai enna vazha vaiyyu naalai
mothamaaga mootakatti thooki poyenda

Appadiye uppumoota thokkikireb de
adi 5-u 6-u aasa mattum theethukiren de
Oththukuren oththukuren ne onnonnaa
sollithandha kathuthukuren da Â .... (Pappappappa pappapaan ...)

Ye manjam mugam paathu naan sevandhuten nethu
mainaave manjakodi kaatu ennaku
Ye vidu kadha venaam ne vidum kadhai venaam
enna venum kanna paathu solllu ennaku

Un poo potta paavaada podhum ennaku
Adhil velli vizha padam kaata aasai iruku
Oththukuren oththukuren naan unnoda
paapaava pethuthukuren da ...

Pappappappa pappapaan Pappappa pappapaan
suthukichu pambaram doi
Pappappa pappapaan Pappappa pappapaan
kathukichu mandhiram doi

Adi raasaathi rosaapu enna solla
en raa thookaam thookikittu porapulla
Naan thillaanaa paaduren thimuraaga aaduren
ennoda kaikhokka vaadi..
Un pollaadha meesayil kuthaaama kuthunaa
sethaa naan poven po po poda ..

seo.title: Pappapappa Lyrics Papparappa Lyrics Vettai single songs lyrics
seo.description: Get the complete Pappapappa Lyrics Papparappa Lyrics Vettai single songs lyrics from Vettai. Read the lyrics penned by Na Muthukumar and composed by Yuvan and sung by Renu. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Na Muthukumar, Vettai, Yuvan, Renu, Yuvan, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
